title: DeltaOne Solutions Appoints James Hackworth to Head of Buy-Side, International
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/3/2015 @ 4:38 AM Companies mentioned in this article: DeltaOne Solutions 
NEW YORK and LONDON, Sept. 3, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- DeltaOne Solutions, a CoreOne Technologies company, today announced the appointment of James Hackworth to Head of Buy-Side, International. In this newly created role, Mr. Hackworth's primary responsibilities will be directing DeltaOne's delivery teams in Europe and Asia in managing the implementation, delivery and enhancement of all buy-side client solutions. Mr. Hackworth will report to Giles Sarton, Global Head of Business Development, DeltaOne. 
"This hire reflects DeltaOne's commitment to attracting the industry's top talent, as well as, our focus on growing DeltaOne's financial technology franchise within the buy-side community," said Giles Sarton. "The addition of James is of strategic importance to our business as we continuously strive to provide customers with the technologies and efficiencies they need to have immediate access to accurate and high-quality financial information. We are confident that James's extensive industry experience will drive growth and further enhance our ability to serve our clients across the full spectrum of finance products and solutions. We are delighted to welcome James to the team." 
The expansion of our delivery and distribution team further strengthens our ability to meet the needs of our customers," says Sarton. "James's comprehensive understanding of implementations and strong program management background, along with his buy-side industry experience, will allow us to exponentially scale our client delivery." 
Mr. Hackworth brings more than 15 years of financial technology industry experience to this new role. He joins DeltaOne from SS&C, where he was Product Manager for SS&C's Performance outsourcing solutions which included the delivery of performance solutions and implementation of client specific performance and attribution reporting production cycles. 
Prior to SS&C Mr. Hackworth was with StatPro plc. 
About DeltaOne Solutions 
DeltaOne Solutions, a CoreOne Technologies company, delivers the investment management and trading communities a comprehensive technology-enabled service, to deliver high quality, timely and accurate global indices and ETF data and documents across all asset classes, customized for their use 24 hours a day via its SOLA platform. 
DeltaOne's 100 plus clients use this information as the trusted source for accurate valuation and analysis of current and future pricing, for hundreds of thousands of indices and ETFs. DeltaOne's clients leverage a powerful combination of mature data service coupled with its fast client-side technology to make snap decisions.
